post.description: This endpoint assigns a single subject to a single student. If the student-subject combination already exists, it will be skipped.

uid.description: User ID of the admin/teacher assigning the subject

get.description: Use this endpoint to get subjects of a student.

delete.summary: Delete a student's subject if the score is 0
delete.description: Deletes a subject assigned to a student if the score is exactly 0. If the subject has a score greater than 0, deletion is not allowed.

parameters.name: uid
parameters.description: The unique ID of the student-subject association

parameters.name: sbj
parameters.description: The subject code or name assigned to the student

400.description: Cannot delete subject due to score conditions

message.example: Cannot delete subject. It has existing scores greater than 0.

The bank code field is required.

post.summary: Change User Password
post.description: Allows an authenticated user to change their password by providing the old password, a new password, and the school ID.

post.summary: Exit a staff member and move them to the exstaffs table
post.description: Marks a staff member as inactive and transfers their data to the exstaffs table along with session and exit details.

200.description: Staff successfully exited and moved to exstaffs

message.example: Staff has been exited successfully and moved to exstaffs.

400.description: Staff has already been moved to exstaffs

message.example: Staff has already been moved to exstaffs.

get.description: Retrieve a list of alumni for a given school with optional filtering by exit class and exit class arm.

parameters.name: exit_class
parameters.description: Exit class of the alumni (e.g., SS3, JSS3)

parameters.name: exit_class_arm
parameters.description: Exit class arm of the alumni (e.g., A, B, C)

get.description: Use this endpoint to retrieve all ex-staff members from a specific school, with optional pagination.

post.summary: Restore an inactive student
post.description: Changes the status of a student from 'inactive' to 'active' based on school ID and student ID.

404.description: Student not found or already active

message.example: Student not found or already active

post.summary: Restore a staff member
post.description: Restores a staff member by setting their status to active and removing their record from the ex-staff table.

200.description: Staff restored successfully and removed from ex-staff.

message.example: Staff restored successfully and removed from ex-staff.

404.description: Staff not found or already active.

message.example: Staff not found or already active.

post.summary: Create or Update Payment Instruction
post.description: This endpoint creates a new payment instruction or updates an existing one if an ID is provided.

id.description: Optional: ID for updating an existing record

get.description: Retrieve the payment instruction for a specific class, term, session, and school.

payment_ins.example: Payment should be made before 10th of the month

delete.description: Deletes payment instructions based on the provided school ID, class ID, session ID, and term ID.

message.example: An error occurred while deleting payment instruction(s).

post.summary: Set attendance for multiple students
post.description: Allows Admin or Form Teacher to set or update attendance status for students for a specific term, class, week, and day.

post.summary: Submit attendance for students
post.description: Allows Admin or Form Teacher to submit attendance for students for a specific week and day.

day.description: Day of the week (e.g., Monday, Tuesday, etc.)

403.description: Unauthorized: Only Admin or Form Teachers can submit attendance

message.example: Unauthorized: Only Admin or Form Teachers can submit attendance.

get.summary: Retrieve attendance records for a given week
get.description: Fetches all attendance records for a specified school, term, session, class main, and class arm for the given week (excluding day).

message.example: No attendance records found for this week.

get.description: Retrieve the attendance statistics (days present and absent) for students in a specific class.

get.summary: Retrieve attendance records grouped by day for a specific week
get.description: Fetches attendance records for a specified week and school ID, grouping the data by day and returning student attendance details for each day.

200.description: Attendance records grouped by day retrieved successfully

message.example: Attendance records grouped by day for the selected week.

404.description: No attendance records found for this week

message.example: No attendance records found for this week.

get.description: Retrieve weekly and overall attendance summary based on specified school, session, term, and class filters.

message.example: No attendance records found for the specified filters.

post.summary: Create or update a lesson plan
post.description: Stores or updates a lesson plan based on school, session, term, class, subject, and date.

items.example: At the end of the lesson, students should be able to count numbers

put.description: Updates an existing lesson plan record based on schid, clsm, ssn, and trm. Only provided fields will be updated.

400.description: No valid fields provided for update

message.example: No valid fields provided for update

get.summary: Get lesson plans for a specific school, session, term, and class
get.description: Fetches lesson plans using school ID, session, term, and class with optional pagination parameters.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of lesson plans to retrieve

200.description: List of lesson plans retrieved successfully

get.description: Fetch lesson plans based on school ID, session, term, class, and subject with optional pagination.

get.summary: Get a single lesson plan by school ID, session, term ID, class, subject, and plan ID

Use this endpoint to fetch curriculum records for a specific school, class, session, term, and subject.

get.description: Fetch curriculum details for a given student based on school ID, session, term, class, subject, and student ID.

post.summary: Create a new lesson note with topics and subtopics

get.summary: Retrieve lesson notes based on school, session, term, and class
get.description: Returns a list of lesson notes along with their topics and sub-topics.
Retrieve lesson notes filtered by school ID, session, term, class, and subject. Supports pagination via 'start' and 'count' query parameters.

put.description: Updates a lesson note's week and topics if they exist. Deletes existing topics and sub-topics before creating new ones.

get.summary: Get a single lesson note with topics and subtopics
get.description: Retrieve a specific lesson note based on school ID, session, term, class, week, and lesson note ID.

parameters.name: lessonNoteId
parameters.description: The ID of the lesson note

get.summary: Get top 10 overall best students based on average score
get.description: Fetches the top 10 students in a school for a given session, term, and class based on their average scores with their rank positions.

200.description: List of top 10 best students with ranks

400.description: Bad request due to missing or invalid parameters

get.summary: Fetch top best-performing students in a particular subject with pagination
get.description: Returns a list of students with the highest total scores in a given subject, class, term, and session. Supports pagination via 'start' and 'count' query parameters.

404.description: No scores found for this subject

message.example: No scores found for this subject

get.summary: Get performance statistics for all subjects based on school, session, term, and class
Get a student's cumulative academic result for all terms in a session
get.description: Retrieves cumulative results including term scores, averages, grades, positions, and student details.

404.description: Student not found or no scores available

message.example: Student not found in specified class/arm

get.summary: Get cumulative result of students for a class
get.description: Returns cumulative result (Term 1, Term 2, Term 3 totals, average, and grade) for all students in a specific class and class arm within a school session.

200.description: List of students with cumulative result

get.summary: Get yearly psychomotor average and term scores for a student

200.description: Successful response with student psychomotor data

404.description: No records found for this student

message.example: No records found for this student.

get.summary: Get all students' yearly psychomotor assessment averages and term scores

get.description: Returns 1st term, 2nd term, 3rd term and yearly average (excluding totals) for all students
Returns the authenticated user and their staff or old staff profile with role names.

get.summary: Get cumulative broadsheet for a given school, session, class, and arm

parameters.name: clsa
parameters.description: Class arm identifier or -1 if not applicable

get.summary: Get all student comments for a given class, arm, session, and term
get.description: Returns all comments for a student based on stid, schid, class, class arm, session, and term

get.summary: Get all comments for a student in a given session and term

post.summary: Create or update a cumulative comment

get.summary: Get a summary of student scores and class positions for a term

parameters.name: clsa
parameters.description: Class arm ID or -1 to include all arms

scores.description: Each subject name maps to an array of scores

400.description: Bad request due to invalid or missing parameters

post.summary: Save or update auto comments by grade for a specific role (Principal, Head Teacher, School Admin)
Generate and save student result comments using manual or auto-comment templates
post.description: This endpoint auto-generates comments based on average grade and selected role (Principal, Head Teacher, School Admin). Manual comments take priority if they exist.

200.description: All student results saved with auto-comments.

message.example: All student results saved with auto-comments.

get.description: Returns a list of subjects for a given class.

post.summary: Promote a student to the next class
post.description: Creates a new promotion record for the student. Previous records remain unchanged.

post.summary: Exit a student and move them to alumni
post.description: Marks a student as inactive and moves them to the alumni database if they are not already present.

200.description: Student successfully exited and moved to alumni

message.example: Student has been exited successfully and moved to alumni.

400.description: Student has already been moved to alumni

message.example: Student has already been moved to alumni.

post.summary: Mark a student to repeat the same class
post.description: Creates a new record for a student to repeat their current class/arm in a new session/term. Previous records remain unchanged.
